full_text: terete] ree Ble; = 2024/KER/4645 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE BECHU KURIAN THOMAS MONDAY, THE 22ND pay OF JANUARY 2024 / 2ND MAGHA, 1945 CRL.MC NO. 685 OF 2024 CRIME NO.88/2021 OF PARLI EXCISE RANGE, Palakkad SC 138/2022 OF ASSISTANT SESSIONS COUR, PALAKKAD PETITIONER/ ACCUSED : SUDARSANAN , AGED 33 YEARS, S/O SUNDARAN, PALAPOTTA VEEDU, PALAPOTTA DESOM, PUDUPARIYARAM II VILLAGE, PALAKKAD TALUK, PALAKKAD DISTRICT, PIN - 678 731 BY ADVS. SARATH M.S. ARJUN C BHASKAR VISHNU C. BHASKAR RESPONDENT/ COMPLAINANT : STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM - 682031, THROUGH THE EXCISE INSPECTOR, EXCISE RANGE OFFICE, PARALI, PALAKKAD, PIN - 682031 BY SRI. NOUSHAD K.A., PUBLIC PROSECUTOR THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 22.01.2024, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING : oe ee 2024/KER/4645 CRL.MC NO. 685 OF 2024 2 BECHU KURIAN THOMAS, J. ~ CriLM.C.No.685 of 2024 Dated this the 22 day of January, 2024 ORDER Petitioner is the accused in S.C.No.138 of 2021 on the files of the Assistant Sessions Court, Palakkad. He faces indictment for the offences under Sections 8(1) and 8(2) of the Kerala Abkari Act, 1077. Due to his failure to appear before the court, non-bailable warrant has been issued. Petitioner challenges the non-bailable warrant issued against him. 2. I have heard Sri.Sarath M.S., the learned counsel for the petitioner as well as Sri.Noushad K.A., the learned Public Prosecutor. 3. Petitioner has submitted that he is willing to appear before the court and participate in the proceedings. 4. Having considered the submissions made across the Bar, I am of the view that this Crl.M.C. can be disposed of with a direction. Hence, there will be a direction to the Assistant Sessions Court, Palakkad to consider the application for bail and for recall of warrant on the same day itself, if filed by the petitioner on or before 31.01.2024. The non-bailable warrant issued against the petitioner shall be kept in abeyance till 31.01.2024 to enable the petitioner to appear before the trial court. The Crl.M.C.is disposed of as above. Sd/- BKM BECHU KURIAN THOMAS, JUDGE terete] ree BP] eT * = 2024/KER/4645 CRL.MC NO. 685 OF 2024 3 APPENDIX OF CRL.MC 685/2024 PETITIONER'S ANNEXURE : Annexure Al THE TRUE COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN SC NO. 138/2022 DATED 31/10/2021
